name: Tooltips for Charts
description:
Need tooltip components that you want to use on graphs or charts? Try these out!

  • Completely Auto Layout, and yes the latest version
  • Single and Multi-data point types
  • Variants for beak directions (top, right, bottom, left)
  • Extra hidden data points if you need more than 3
  • Flexible styling


Support
